comment._content: Wife of Harold C. Jaquith www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/7314071500/ formerly Marie Harin. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00F16FE3B5D1A72...

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Exiled Romanoff princess, too! She was in New York on January 19, 1927 , at the annual meeting of Near East Relief to receive the organization's Distinguished Service Medal as a member of its overseas staff. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10D11FF3E5B157A... The four honorees pictured in this collection: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/tags/neareastre...
